items.sentence: Tom was sitting on a tree stump, eating a piece of pie.
What Tom did yesterday gave us something to talk about.
You must be more careful when you're writing in French.
Can you play the oboe as well as you play the clarinet?
Tom isn't our new drummer. He's our new lead guitarist.
Sometimes I feel like I'm not making myself understood.
There's a bank about a hundred metres from the library.
All the boys in Mary's class wanted to go out with her.
Tom is in his room studying for tomorrow's French test.
Tom was teaching French in Australia, the last I heard.
